item.description:
Tuesday July 10th, Julians will host a 4 way tap invasion featuring some classic as well as specialty offerings from four great breweries:

Stone

Smuttynose

Sixpoint

New England Brew Co

Â 

Event runs till close and each of the four breweries will have reps there hanging and talking beer and high fiving folks. This is what they will be pouring:

STONE BREWING http://www.stonebrew.com/home.asp

*Arrogant Bastard http://www.stonebrew.com/arrogantbastard/

*Smoked Vanilla Porter http://blog.stonebrew.com/index.ph ... rainchild/

*Ruination 10 http://blog.stonebrew.com/index.ph ... e-big-1-0/


SIXPOINT BREWERY http://sixpoint.com/

*Resin http://sixpoint.com/beers/core/resin

*Smith Pale Ale

*Signal (smoked ipa)

SMUTTYNOSE BREWING http://www.smuttynose.com/

*Homunculus dry hopped with st germaine soaked oak staves on cask! http://www.smuttynose.com/beers/th ... culus.html

*Vintage Baltic Porter http://www.smuttynose.com/beers/th ... orter.html

*Star Island Single http://www.smuttynose.com/beers/fu ... ingle.html

*Wheat Wine http://www.smuttynose.com/beers/th ... e_ale.html

NEW ENGLAND BREWING COMPANY http://newenglandbrewing.com/

*Stout Trooper http://beeradvocate.com/beer/profi ... 357/34484/

*Ghandi Bot Imperial IPA http://beeradvocate.com/beer/profi ... /357/57259

*Fuzzy Baby Ducks on Cask! http://beeradvocate.com/beer/profi ... brinus1184

*Scrumtrulescent Saison http://beeradvocate.com/beer/profi ... oosterbill
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there at some point, but this is just an FYI for those who love beer!
item.name: FYI- Julian's 4 Way Tap Invasion
